attributes.action: Give the motorist a fighting chance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I ask the government to put 100 yard warnings of speed limit changes well in advance in all areas, if your going to 'hide' speed cameras then make the motorist aware of the speed limit and not instantaneous change as is at present the case..

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
